text: "The Riddle" is a 1984 song by English singer-songwriter Nik Kershaw and is the title track to his second studio album The Riddle. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, Portugal and Ireland, number 6 in New Zealand and Australia, number 49 in Canada, number 12 in Finland, number 19 in the Netherlands, number 18 in France, number 10 in Italy and number 5 in Sweden and Norway. It was covered by Gigi D'Agostino in 1999. ==Track listing== 7" Single (WEA NIK 6) A: "The Riddle" – 3:52 B: "Progress" (Live) – 3:02 12" Single (WEA NIKT 6) A: "The Riddle" (Extended Riddle) – 5:08 B: "Progress" (Live) – 3:02 Cassette Single (WEA NIKC 6) A1: "The Riddle" – 3:52 A2: "Interview" A3: "Progress" (Live) – 3:02 B1: "I Won't Let the Sun Go Down on Me" (Extended Mix) B2: "Wouldn't It Be Good" (Extended Mix) == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Nik Kershaw songs
